originalText.text:
Great experience with this company! i needed a space for a short term until my lease starts. service was quick, the easiest process. they have been really helpful and make it so easy with easy requirements and i was able to move in within 3 days from the moment i called to their office.
The apt was super cute, great location and their service was impeccable..

Highly recommended for furnished rental..

originalText.text:
The entire booking system is quite dysfunctional. They collaborate with Soho Loft, but whenever there's an issue with the apartment, neither party seems to address it adequately. From a broken pipe to extremely unreliable Wi-Fi that's virtually unheard of in the city (making it challenging to even make phone calls at times) to the presence of cockroaches, the living conditions leave much to be desired.

Once you've booked with them, it feels like no one takes responsibility for anything. I would strongly advise against booking with them, as it's likely to make your life considerably more complicated.

originalText.text: I had a very enjoyable time with this company, and the agents were very detailed. Something I really like about this company is that all their agents were knowledgeable about condos and what condos would best fit based on what requirements I had. I mentioned that I worked at Columbus Circle, and the agents remembered and tried to find condos in the locations I wanted that were near areas that I could easily take transportation to Columbus Circle. They found condos that would be convenient for me because they know I really value the location of the condo. They also took into account the various amenities and requirements I had and which ones I valued the most. I had a price range of around 1 mil to 1.4 mil and they were able to find condos that fit in that range that fulfilled the requirements I had. They were also very flexible around my schedule when it came to scheduling meetings and scheduling showings. Overall, I had a very good experience with this company and its agents, and they definitely go above and beyond to help find my dream home. If I were to move, I would definitely come back for help.

originalText.text: I had a very good experience with this company and its agents. The professionalism was definitely there, right from the start. I called in to see if I could make an appointment, and the agent on the phone was very kind and flexible with my schedule. When I went into the office, the building was very modern and all the employees greeted me even if they weren’t working with me directly. They were very friendly and the agents who worked with me were very helpful and knowledgeable. The agents answered all the questions I had and they were able to find a condo for me that met all my requirements and my price range. The agents accompanied me to every showing and introduced me to each landlord and I felt very comfortable throughout the whole process. The agents were very focused on finding the perfect home for me and making my condo search as easy as it possibly could be, and I did end up finding a really great condo with all the requirements I asked for. I really liked how professional and dedicated the company and its agents were in finding me my perfect home.

originalText.text: APT212 is by far the best company for short rentals. My entire stay with them was more than satisfied. I relocated to New York in a short notice and was having trouble finding an ideal place to live in. The agency was very helpful, the agents are responsive and the process is easier than I thought it would be. Thanks to APT212 I was able to find an apartment that was not only affordable but satisfying as well.
